radiographic_examinations.findings: Seven spot fluoroscopic radiographs demonstrate degenerative changes of the thoracolumbar spine. An irregular filling defect was observed after injection of contrast into the biliary tree, and a 4-mm stone was removed. No significant dilatation of the CBD, common hepatic duct, or intrahepatic biliary ducts was noted. The cystic duct and gallbladder were partially visualized.
